NOTARIES PUBLIC AND COMMISSIONERS OF DEEDS FOR THE SEVERAL STATES.
War Claim Office of
RAWLE & BRO.
St. Louis, Mo. March 7th 1864
State of Missouri
County of Saint Louis } SS.

I S. Perit Rawle of the city and county of St. Louis State of Missouri, do solemnly swear that I have at all times and ever will support, protect and defend the Constitution and Government of the United States, against all enemies whether domestic or Foreign, and that I will bear true faith, allegiance and Loyalty to the same, any ordinance, resolution, or law of any of any State Convention or Legislature to the contrary Notwithstanding. Further that I do this with a full determination pledge and purpose, without any mental reservation or evasion whatsoever. And further that I will well and faithfully perform all the duties which may be required of me by law. So help me God.
Sworn to & subscribed before me this 7th day of March A. D 1864
